name: Tidy Cauldron
description:
A game about organizing ingredients in a cauldron to make magical potions ! Controls

Left click to move ingredients

Right click to rotate them

We started this project as a 48h game jam. 

There are currently 31 Levels. We will probably add more in the future.

Credits

Music: "Funny Play" by Chiro

Game Design & Art: Florian Launay

Game Design & Programming: Lisa Fontaine
